data.comment: The match has started at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Ismail Elfath signals a throw-in for Miami, close to Atlanta's area.
In the minute 2, Atlanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Miami's Lewis Morgan misses with an attempt on goal.
Atlanta have a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Miami push forward at Inter Miami CF Stadium and Gonzalo Higuain gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Atlanta defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Miami close to the penalty box.
In the minute 5, Throw-in Miami.
Throw-in for Atlanta at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Miami pushes forward through Gonzalo Higuain, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 7, Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Eric Remedi (Atlanta) gets a yellow card.
Miami are pushing forward but Gonzalo Higuain's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 9, It's a goal kick for the away team in Fort Lauderdale.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
Ismail Elfath awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 10, Ismail Elfath signals a Atlanta throw-in in Miami's half.
Miami's Leandro Gonzalez Pirez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Atlanta at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Atlanta in their own half.
Miami needs to be cautious. Atlanta have an attacking throw-in.
Atlanta to take a throw-in in Miami territory.
In the minute 14, Miami's Gonzalo Higuain gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Atlanta defender.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
In the minute 16, Ball safe as Atlanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Miami in the half of Atlanta.
Wil Trapp for Miami gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 18, Ismail Elfath awards Atlanta a goal kick.
Miami have a dangerous throw-in.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
In the minute 21, Can Atlanta capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Miami's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Atlanta goal kick.
Throw-in for Miami in the half of Atlanta.
In the minute 23, Miami are in shooting range from this free kick.
In Fort Lauderdale, Gonzalo Higuain of Miami is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Miami.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Atlanta in their own half.
Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
In the minute 27, Miami's Lewis Morgan breaks free at Inter Miami CF Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Atlanta have a goal kick.
Miami drive upfield and Gonzalo Higuain gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Atlanta defender.
In the minute 29, Can Miami get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlanta's half?
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
In the minute 32, Ismail Elfath awards Miami a goal kick.
Atlanta have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Corner awarded to Atlanta.
In the minute 34, Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ismail Elfath signals a Miami throw-in in Atlanta's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 37, Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Miami.
Throw-in high up the field for Miami in Fort Lauderdale.
Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
In the minute 41, Ismail Elfath awards the away team a throw-in.
Miami push upfield but Ismail Elfath quickly pulls them for offside.
In Fort Lauderdale a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the home team in Fort Lauderdale.
Ismail Elfath blows to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Miami at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlanta goal kick.
Atlanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 48, Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
Brooks Lennon (Atlanta) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In Fort Lauderdale Miami attack through Lewis Morgan. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 49, Goal kick for Atlanta at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Throw-in Miami.
Free kick Atlanta.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Miami in the half of Atlanta.
Corner awarded to Atlanta.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fort Lauderdale.
In the minute 54, Matias Pellegrini for Miami gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ismail Elfath awards Atlanta a goal kick.
Can Miami get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlanta's half?
In the minute 55, Ball safe as Miami is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Atlanta.
In Fort Lauderdale, Miami push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 57, Jurgen Damm is replacing Manuel Castro for the away team.
Mo Adams is on a sub for Jeff Larentowicz for Atlanta.
Miami to take a throw-in in Atlanta territory.
In the minute 59, Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Atlanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Miami's half?
Ismail Elfath awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 61, Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
Matias Pellegrini (Miami) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Atlanta needs to be cautious. Miami have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 63, Miami's Nicolas Figal is on target but unsuccessful.
Important block from the Atlanta defence as Victor Ulloa fires in a strike for Miami.
Throw-in for Miami in the half of Atlanta.
In the minute 65, Miami have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick Atlanta.
Atlanta surge into the attack at Inter Miami CF Stadium but Anton Walkesâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 66, Miami have a goal kick.
Lewis Morgan's header is off-target for Miami.
Goal kick for Atlanta at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Atlanta in the half of Miami.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
Adam Jahn is booked for the away team.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Miami close to the penalty box.
The away team replace Adam Jahn with Jake Mulraney.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Miami just outside Atlanta's area.
In the minute 72, Lewis Morgan for Miami drives towards goal at Inter Miami CF Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Miami to take a throw-in in Atlanta territory.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Miami at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Fort Lauderdale to check on Brooks Lennon, who is grimacing with pain.
Brooks Lennon is back on the pitch.
In the minute 75, Miami's Ben Sweat breaks free at Inter Miami CF Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlanta goal kick.
Atlanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 76, Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Fort Lauderdale a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Diego Alonso is making the team's first substitution at Inter Miami CF Stadium with Brek Shea replacing Matias Pellegrini.
In the minute 78, Miami push forward at Inter Miami CF Stadium and Gonzalo Higuain gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Atlanta defence.
Throw-in for Atlanta in their own half.
Brek Shea is on target to give Miami a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 80, Great play from Lewis Morgan to set up the goal.
Atlanta make their fourth substitution with Laurence Wyke replacing Brooks Lennon.
The away team have replaced Jon Gallagher with Erick Torres. This is the fifth substitution made today by Stephen Glass.
In the minute 82, Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
Jake Mulraney grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Jurgen Damm with an assist there.
In the minute 84, Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Miami.
Goal kick for Miami at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Miami in their own half.
Atlanta's Laurence Wyke has been booked in Fort Lauderdale.
Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Federico Higuain is replacing Victor Ulloa for the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Miami goal kick.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Miami.
Free kick for Atlanta in the half of Miami.
Free kick Atlanta.
Ball safe as Miami is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Fort Lauderdale a free kick has been awarded the away team.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
In Fort Lauderdale, Laurence Wyke (Atlanta) misses the target with a header.
Ismail Elfath awards Miami a goal kick.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
At Inter Miami CF Stadium, Wil Trapp has been yellow-carded for the home team.
